item.title: The Madison Group introduces the Venini and Rimadesio collection to Singapore
item.description: The Madison Group, headquartered in Hong Kong, has expanded its Southeast Asian presence by introducing two Italian interior design brands to Singapore: Venini and Rimadesio. Source: The Madison Group. Rimadesio products. Venini is renowned for its handcrafted Venetian mouth-blown glassware, while Rimadesio specializes in glass and aluminum furniture and accessories. The Madison Group holds exclusive distribution rights for both brands in Singapore. There are also plans to offer Venini glassware at select locations and retailers.
